n14347: I'm deciding between a Master's and a PhD in Biomedical Engineering, as my current Bachelor's degree isn't getting me a job anywhere.  Which is the better pick and why? If it helps, I live in Canada.
b21963: Dont understand how or why anyone would love me. Cant stop obsessing about my wife and kid being better off without me. I wish I could disappear and be forgotten without hurting anyone
